attributes.additional_details: We no longer need this, it was introduced for reasons that are no longer relevant.  There are also safety concerns from a sudden time change for road users.
attributes.background: Bring an end to the clock changing twice a year.  Agree which time to adopt and stick with it.  Bring an end to British Summer Time

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Abolish daylight saving changes. Keep British Summer Time of GMT +1 year round.'

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626972
